To do the deployment with the command "ant" you have to do the following steps:

1. Go to the "SourceSVN" tab.
From here you'll get the url and the user to input into the SVN Checkout . 

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/GoogleCodeSource.png" align="left" />

2. To enable the deployment, you must have the TortoiseSVN program installed.
[http://tortoisesvn.net/downloads To download the TortoiseSVN click  here]

3. Create a folder where you want to save the project.

4. Inside the created folder make click in the right mouse button and select the SVN Checkout... option.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/SVNCheckout.png" align="left" />

5. Enter a URL obtained in step 1 and click on OK button.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/SVNCheckoutWindow.png" align="left" />

6. The project creates in the folder.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/GoogleCodeFolder.png" align="left" />

7.You have to add two files to this folder.
